text-node.description: Renders a full product detail page. If the http parameter "format" is set to "json" the product details are rendered as JSON response.
Determines a product based on the given ID.
Renders a full product detail page. If the http parameter "format" is set to "json" the product details are rendered as JSON response.
Returns product variants data as a JSON. Called via product.js (loadVariation). Input: pid (required) - product ID

Returns product availability data as a JSON object. Called via product.js (reloadAvailability). Input: pid (required) - product ID quantity (required) - the quantity to use for determining avalability
Determine if at least there is 1 online SetProduct in case it is s Product Set. if all of the Set Products are offline then we return not found view.

decision-node.description: For dynamic categories (e.g. New Arrivals), the primaryCategory property does not exist on Product

text-node.description: Returns true if at least one SetProduct is online otherwise false i.e. when all SetProducts are offline. Expects Product instance
Renders the product detail page within the context of a category.
Renders the last visisted products based on the session information.
Formats given prices into money based on site setting. Http Param: salePrice, standardPrice Returns: formatted prices as json
Renders a list of bonus products for a bonus discount line item.
